title: Typophile Merch Store Hiatus
content:
Submitted by [Joe Pemberton](http://web.archive.org/web/20071212184449/http:/typophile.com/user/1160 "View user profile.") : 7.Dec.2007 8.38pm 

**Typophile Merch Store Closing & Year End Sale**

On Tuesday, December 11th the [Typophile Merch Store](http://web.archive.org/web/20071212184449/http:/typophile.bigcartel.com/) will go on a 6 month hiatus. This is your last chance for Typophile merchandise until June 2008!

The 2007 «Type Specimen» tee is on sale. Get the **[men's](http://web.archive.org/web/20071212184449/http:/typophile.bigcartel.com/product/type-specimen-mens)** or **[women's tee](http://web.archive.org/web/20071212184449/http:/typophile.bigcartel.com/product/type-specimen-womens)** for just $19 US. For the next 4 days you can get a deal on the 2007 tee and have it shipped in time for the Christmas holiday.

[![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071212184449im_/http:/typophile.bigcartel.com/account/9067/66554/300.jpg)](http://web.archive.org/web/20071212184449/http:/typophile.bigcartel.com/product/type-specimen-womens)

<font face="helvetica, arial" size="1">DETAILS: The sale applies to orders transacted between Saturday, December 8 and Tuesday December 11 at Noon Pacific. All outstanding orders to date will be shipped at that time. The merchandise store will close at the end of that sale for a 6 month hiatus. Expect the store back in action in June 2008.</font>

In the meantime, you may continue to [make donations](http://web.archive.org/) at various contribution levels through the store.
author: Joe Pemberton
